cards.flavor_text: [i]The first day of rescue efforts is the most important. Wasted time is wasted lives.[/i]
[i]The K-11 is so big, it uses a pistol firing a 10mm round as a firing pin for the 500mm primary shell. In case of emergency, the pistol can be removed and used as a hold out weapon.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant vehicle or creature
Enchanted permanent can't attack or crew vehicles. Its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Inhabitants of the outlands are uniquely suited to their environments. Some float on the wind to keep cool, while others do it to stay warm.[/i]
